George Leonard

  1. Foster Name:
  2. Foster Family: Clemens and Elizabeth Tingelhoff
  3. Location of Family: Fremont, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital
  5. Arrival Place: Unknown
  6. Age on Arrival: 9 mos.
  7. Date of Birth: 1918-03-15
  8. Gender: male
  9. Source: Crossroads, May 1989. p. 6; Eloise Thomsen Corres., 8 July 1989 (Eloise Thomsen to Ann Wheat); National Orphan Train Complex; 1910 United States Federal Census; Marilyn Irvin Holt, The Orphan Trains: Placing Out in America (University of Nebraska Press, 1992), 57.
